title: AutomaticTurret1 SoundEffect
description: This is a sound package for automated turret weapons that shoot enemies. If your game features turret items in modern or futuristic warfare themes, this is the pack for you
longDescription:
Preview.

  • https://youtu.be/uuA0-sfEnbE


This is a sound package for automated turret weapons that shoot enemies. If your game features turret items in modern or futuristic warfare themes, this is the pack for you.
